description: This file defines the AppShell widget, a lightweight container that provides a Scaffold with a common AppBar and safe area layout. It is intended for use as a basic page container in a Flutter mobile app.

classes.name: AppShell
classes.description: A widget that provides a basic Scaffold with an AppBar and flexible body area, used as a container for pages.

methods.name: AppShell
methods.description: Constructor for AppShell, requires a child widget.

methods.name: build
methods.description: Builds and returns the Scaffold widget with AppBar and SafeArea containing the child.
